coreAttributes.name: collar bowtie
coreAttributes.description: A shirt collar, with a smart, pre-tied bowtie affixed to the front.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before fastening the collar bowtie around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc.her] collar bowtie, before taking it off from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] collar bowtie, before taking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] collar bowtie, before yanking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
